messages: ðŸ’¡ Tip: Never dig straight down! You might fall into lava.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Always light up your base with torches to prevent hostile mobs from spawning.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Keep a bucket of water in your hotbar to save yourself from fall damage or fire.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: To find diamonds, mine at Y-level -58.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Sleep in a bed to set your spawn point and skip the night.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Build a shield to block attacks from skeletons and other mobs.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Create an infinite water source with a 2x2 hole and two buckets of water.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Trade with villagers to get valuable items like enchanted books and diamond gear.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Build a portal to the Nether to travel long distances in the Overworld quickly.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Strip-mining is a safe and effective way to find ores.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Tame a wolf to have a loyal companion that will fight for you.
ðŸ’¡ Tip: Build a small farm early on for a sustainable food source.
